name: Ninjas and priestess
description:
Your mission is to defeat the evil forces that invaded the city of Edo (Tokyo) and rescue the hostages.

Explore Edo with your team of heroes, a new one will join you during the adventure.

You will meet various women too. Some of them will help you and will be very close to you but the others are very dangerous, don't fall into their traps!

Look for secret passages:

 And other surprises, but I don't want to say too much ...
